name: BlackTube | Dark Theme
description:
This theme only works on the old youtube layout, so follow the instructions below

step 1: download this zip and unzip - https://dropmefiles.com/CRRTX
step 2: open your browser and click on the extension option
step 3: click on the option to load an extension and select the previously extracted folder

Please leave your feedback
If you find bugs please report me

discussions.name: Great but i'd put the normal buffer and volume bar back
Another script that doesn't even show up...
